sentences.sContent: Raised on a hog farm in Hunan Province, she laughs off the penurious ways of her parents and grandparents.
sentences.sContent_eng: Raised on a hog farm in Hunan Province, she laughs off the penurious ways of her parents and grandparents.
sentences.sCn: 她笑着说起在湖南养猪的父母的吝啬的生活方式。

remMethod.val: 来自penur (y) (贫穷； 吝啬) + ious → 吝啬的
